content: *reminiscent of ocean waves with a stylized sun center motif this doily is a striking decorator accent when displayed in a modern living room for a trendy decorating touch attach the finished doily to a painted canvas and hang on the wall coats & clark * skill level intermediate video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=xn3o9et4hls aunt lydia s® fashion crochet thread size 3 2 balls 65 warm teal crochet hook 3 5mm us e-4 art 182 150 yd 147m balls straight pins and foam surface for blocking optional gauge rounds 1-4 = 5½ from point to point special stitch cross stitch
